User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the LandEase application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity. This is the same as the Firebase Authentication UID.

Page.title: Page
Page.description: Represents a landing page created by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Page entity.

userId.description: The UID of the user who owns the landing page.

name.description: The name of the landing page.

content.description: A JSON string containing the structure and content of the landing page components.

published.description: Indicates whether the landing page is published and publicly accessible.

createdAt.description: The timestamp indicating when the landing page was created.

collections.description: Stores user profile information. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Authentication UID.
Stores landing page data created by users.
